headline: AMC+ NOW AVAILABLE TO SPECTRUM TV SELECT CUSTOMERS AT NO ADDITIONAL COST
summary: Spectrum and AMC Networks today announced Spectrum TV Select customers now have access to ad-supported AMC+, AMC Networks' premier streaming service, at no extra cost to customers. Retailing at $6.99 per month, AMC+ features popular originals like "Dark Winds" and "Anne Rice's Mayfair Witches," new seasons from "The Walking Dead" Universe, plus exclusive movies and award-winning series like "Mad Men" from AMC Networks' collection of brands. AMC+'s inclusion in Spectrum video packages was part of
